document_data.name: Street of Staves
document_data.mainbody: The '''Street of Staves''' was a wide city street that started at the [[Promenade (Suzail)|Promenade]] and ended in a junction with [[Blade Lane]].

Description.Notable Locations: * [[The Wedding Knight]], a store that dealt in luxurious clothes and fabrics, frequented by Suzail's nobility.<ref group="note">The position of the the Wedding Knight in not marked on the interactive [[Map:Suzail â€“ 15th Century DR|map of Suzail]] as its placing was not stated in ''[[Volo's Guide to Cormyr]]''.
